document.full_text: congressman jesse jackson jr. said on wednesday he never offered or was asked to raise money for former illinois governor rod blagojevich in return for appointment to a vacant illinois senate seat.
document.title: jesse jackson jr. denies offering political cash to blagojevich
lines_and_colors: congressman jesse jackson jr. said on wednesday he never offered or was asked to raise money for former illinois governor rod blagojevich in return for appointment to a vacant illinois senate seat.
